mapper.select: select ci.class_id, ci.category_id, ci.title, ci.thumbnail_image, ci.class_type, ci.instructor_name, ci.instructor_image_url, ci.region, ci.price, co.schedule_date, co.start_time, co.end_time FROM class ci JOIN class_open co ON ci.class_id = co.class_id ORDER BY co.schedule_date

select ci.class_id, ci.category_id, ci.title, ci.thumbnail_image, ci.class_type, ci.instructor_name, ci.instructor_image_url, ci.region, ci.price, co.schedule_date, co.start_time, co.end_time FROM class ci JOIN class_open co ON ci.class_id = co.class_id where ci.category_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY co.schedule_date
